title: Antiquarian

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player. Learn whether they and the player they visit are suspicious, but not which result belongs to who.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Innocent players you learn the result of gain 1 stress. You aren't informed if this happens.
- If a player does not visit tonight, you simply learn whether you found them suspicious.
- If a player visits multiple others, you learn the results of all the players they visit.

desc:
Post 5331
*She searches where others will not go, and sees what others will not see.*
